basic-info: Label for basic information about a resource
cancel: Button label to cancel an action
close: Button label to close a dialog
delete: Button label to delete a resource
description: Label for a text field that collects a description of a resource
displayed: Label for the field that toggles the visibility of a resource
duplicate: Button label to duplicate a resource
edit: Button label to edit a resource
email-address: Label for a text field that collects email address
join: Button label to go to the page to join the game
key: Label for a text field that collects a unique key for a resource
name: Label for a text field that collects a name
password: Label for a text field that collects a password
password-confirm: Label for a text field that confirms the password
password-current: Label for a text field that collects the current password
password-new: Label for a text field that collects a new password
password-new-confirm: Label for a text field that confirms a new password
preview: Label for a section that provides a preview of a resource
restore: Button label to restore a resource from a deleted state
save: Button label to save a resource
save-now: Button label to save resources immediately
auth-attempts:
Message that explains the user has attempted to sign in to the system too many times and tells them how long they have to wait before attempting again.

Parameters:
* $2 - the number of seconds the user has to wait before attempting to sign in again
auth-back-home: Button label to leave the sign in page and go back to the main page
auth-forgot-password: Button label to go to the password reset page
auth-password-invalid-token: Error message that the password reset token is invalid
auth-password-invalid-user: Error message that a user record could not be found with the email address the user provided
auth-password-link-sent: Message that the password reset link has been successfully sent
auth-password-requirements: Error message that explains what the requirements for a password are
auth-password-reset-success: Message that the user's password has been successfully reset
auth-required-reset: Message that a password reset is required, shown in the header
auth-required-reset-explain: Message that explains an administrator has required the user to reset their password
auth-reset-password: Button label to reset a password
auth-send-reset-link: Button label to send the password reset link
auth-success: Message that a user has successfully signed in, shown in the header
auth-validation-credentials: Validation message when a user's email address or password are not found
auth-validation-token: Validation message when there is no password reset token
authorize-permissions: Label for permission management; appears in the header and buttons
authorize-permissions-add: Label for adding a new permission; appears in the header and buttons
authorize-permissions-confirm-delete-mes: Confirmation message for deleting a permission
authorize-permissions-confirm-delete-tit: Title for the confirmation dialog for deleting a permission
authorize-permissions-error-add: Link text to add a permission in the error message shown when there are no permissions
authorize-permissions-error-not-found: Error message shown when there are no permissions
authorize-permissions-update: Label for updating a permission; appears in the header and buttons
authorize-permissions-find: Label for the text field that filters permissions down to what the user types
authorize-permissions-flash-added-messag: Flash message notifying the user the permission has been created; appears in the body of the flash message
authorize-permissions-flash-added-title: Flash message notifying the user the permission has been created; appears in the header or body of the flash message
authorize-permissions-flash-deleted-mess: Flash message notifying the user the permission has been deleted; appears in the body of the flash message
authorize-permissions-flash-deleted-titl: Flash message notifying the user the permission has been deleted; appears in the header or body of the flash message
authorize-permissions-flash-updated-mess: Flash message notifying the user the permission has been updated; appears in the body of the flash message
authorize-permissions-flash-updated-titl: Flash message notifying the user the permission has been updated; appears in the header or body of the flash message
authorize-roles: Label for role management; appears in the header and buttons
authorize-roles-add: Label for adding a new role; appears in the header and buttons
authorize-roles-can: Title for the dialog that explains what actions a role can take
authorize-roles-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message for deleting a role
authorize-roles-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation dialog for deleting a role
authorize-roles-error-add: Link text in the error message when no roles are found
authorize-roles-error-not-found: Error message when there are no roles found
authorize-roles-flash-added-message: Flash message notifying the user the role has been created; appears in the body of the flash message
authorize-roles-flash-added-title: Flash message notifying the user the role has been created; appears in the header or body of the flash message
authorize-roles-flash-deleted-message: Flash message notifying the user the role has been deleted; appears in the body of the flash message
authorize-roles-flash-deleted-title: Flash message notifying the user the role has been deleted; appears in the header or body of the flash message
authorize-roles-flash-updated-message: Flash message notifying the user the role has been updated; appears in the body of the flash message
authorize-roles-flash-updated-title: Flash message notifying the user the role has been updated; appears in the header or body of the flash message
authorize-roles-update: Label for updating a role; appears in the header and buttons
users: Label for users management; appears in the headers and buttons
users-add: Label for adding a new user; appears in the header and buttons
users-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message for deleting a user
users-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation message for deleting a user
users-confirm-restore-message: Confirmation message to ensure a user wants to restore a user from a deleted state
users-confirm-restore-title: Title of the confirmation dialog to restore a user from a deleted state
users-deleted-notice: Explanation that users with content on their account aren't deleted
users-error-add: Link text in the error message when no users are found
users-error-not-found: Error message when no users are found
users-find: Label for the text field that filters users down to what the user types
users-flash-added-message: Flash message that notifies when a new user is created
users-flash-added-title: Title of the flash message that notifies when a new user is created
users-flash-deleted-message: Title of the flash message that notifies when a user is deleted
users-flash-deleted-title: Flash message that notifies when a user is deleted
users-flash-password-reset-message: Flash message that notifies when users have had their passwords reset by an admin
users-flash-password-reset-title: Title of the flash message that notifies when users have had their passwords reset by an admin
users-flash-restored-message: Flash message that notifies when a user and their content have been restored from a deleted state
users-flash-restored-title: Title of the flash message that notifies when a user and their content have been restored from a deleted state
users-flash-updated-message: Flash message that notifies when a user has been updated
users-flash-updated-title: Title of the flash message that notifies when a user has been updated
users-manage: Button label for going to the user management page
users-password-do-reset: Button label for initiating password resets
users-password-reset: Button label for going to the admin-forced password reset page
users-status-all: Label for all users; appears in a dropdown of user statuses
users-status-active: Label for active users; appears in a dropdown of user statuses
users-status-inactive: Label for inactive users; appears in a dropdown of user statuses
users-status-pending: Label for pending users; appears in a dropdown of user statuses
users-status-removed: Label for deleted users; appears in a dropdown of user statuses
users-update: Label for updating a user; appears in headers and buttons
users-validation-email-email: Validation message when an email address isn't a valid email address
users-validation-email-required: Validation message when an email address isn't entered
users-validation-email-unique: Validation message when an email address is already in use
users-validation-name: Validation message when a name isn't entered
users-validation-password-confirmed: Validation message when the password confirmation field doesn't match the password field
users-validation-password-min: Validation message when a password doesn't meet the minimum number of characters
users-validation-password-required: Validation message when there's no password
users-my-profile: Label for a user profile; shown to a user in regard to their own profile
users-profile-flash-password-updated-mes: Flash message that notifies a user they've changed their password
users-profile-flash-password-updated-tit: Title for the flash message that notifies a user they've changed their password
users-profile-flash-profile-updated-mess: Flash message that notifies a user they've updated their profile
users-profile-flash-profile-updated-titl: Title for the flash message that notifies a user they've updated their profile
users-profile-password-change: Label for a button to change a password
users-profile-update: Label for updating the user's profile; appears in headers and buttons
users-profile-validation-current-passwor: Validation message that the current password doesn't match what's on record for the user
genre-depts: Label for departments management; appears in the headers and buttons
genre-depts-add: Label for adding a new department; appears in the header and buttons
genre-depts-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message before deleting a department
genre-depts-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation message to delete a department
genre-depts-error-add: Text for the call to action link when no departments were found in the database
genre-depts-error-not-found: Error message when no departments were found in the database
genre-depts-find: Label for the text field that filters departments down to what the user types
genre-depts-flash-added-message: Flash message notifying a user that a department has been created
genre-depts-flash-added-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a department has been added
genre-depts-flash-deleted-message: Flash message notifying a user that a department has been deleted
genre-depts-flash-deleted-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a department has been deleted
genre-depts-flash-updated-message: Flash message notifying the user that a department has been updated
genre-depts-flash-updated-title: Title of the flash message notifying a user that the department has been updated
genre-depts-manage: Button label to go tothe manage departments page
genre-depts-none: Label for when there is no department selected
genre-depts-parent: Label for the text field that allows users to change the parent department
genre-depts-parent-none: Text field placeholder for when there is no parent department selected
genre-depts-reorder: Button label to go to the page to reorder departments
genre-depts-select: Label for the dropdown of all departments
genre-depts-update: Button label for updating a department
genre-positions: Label for position management; appears in headers and buttons
genre-positions-add: Label for adding a new position; appears in the header and button
genre-positions-add-another: Button label for adding another position in department management
genre-positions-available: Label for the field that sets the number of available slots for users to fill
genre-positions-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message before deleting a position
genre-positions-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation message to delete a position
genre-positions-error-add: Text for the call to action link when no positions were found in the database
genre-positions-error-not-found: Error message when no positions were found in the database
genre-positions-error-not-found-dept: Error message when no positions were found in the database for the selected department
genre-positions-find: Label for the text field that filters positions down to what the user types
genre-positions-flash-added-message: Flash message notifying a user that a position has been created
genre-positions-flash-added-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a position has been added
genre-positions-flash-deleted-message: Flash message notifying a user that a position has been deleted
genre-positions-flash-deleted-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a position has been deleted
genre-positions-flash-updated-message: Flash message notifying the user that all positions have been updated
genre-positions-flash-updated-title: Title of the flash message notifying a user that all positions have been updated
genre-positions-flash-validation-message: Flash message notifying the user that there were validation issues with updating positions
genre-positions-flash-validation-title: Title of the flash message notifying a user that there were validation issues
genre-positions-select: Label for the dropdown of all positions
genre-positions-start: Message that prompts the user to select a department to show its positions
genre-positions-unsaved: Message that notifies a user they have unsaved changes to their positions
genre-positions-validation-dept-exists: Validation message that prompts the user to select a valid department when creating a position
genre-positions-validation-dept-required: Validation message when the department is missing
genre-ranks: Label for rank management landing page
genre-ranks-add: Label for adding a new rank; appears in the header and button
genre-ranks-build: Message to start the rank building process by selecting options
genre-ranks-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message before deleting a rank
genre-ranks-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation message before deleting a rank
genre-ranks-error-not-found-group: Error message when no ranks are found for a selected rank group
genre-ranks-explain: Text that explains what rank items are and how they work with rank groups and rank info
genre-ranks-find: Label for the text field that filters ranks down to what the user types
genre-ranks-flash-added-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank has been created
genre-ranks-flash-added-title: Title for the flash message that notifies a user that a rank has been created
genre-ranks-flash-deleted-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank has been deleted
genre-ranks-flash-deleted-title: Title for the flash message that notifies a user that a rank has been deleted
genre-ranks-flash-duplicated-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank has been duplicated
genre-ranks-flash-duplicated-title: Title for the flash message that notifies a user that a rank has been duplicated
genre-ranks-flash-updated-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank has been updated
genre-ranks-flash-updated-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a rank has been updated
genre-ranks-image-base: Label for the selection of a rank's base image
genre-ranks-image-overlay: Label for the selection of a rank's overlay image
genre-ranks-start: Message prompting the user to select a rank group to get all ranks for that group
genre-ranks-update: Label for updating a rank; appears in buttons and headers
genre-ranks-validation-group-exists: Validation message when an invalid rank group is submitted
genre-ranks-validation-group-required: Validation message when there's a missing rank group
genre-ranks-validation-info-exists: Validation message when an invalid rank info is submitted
genre-ranks-validation-info-required: Validation message when there's a missing rank info
genre-rank-groups-add: Label for adding a new rank group; appears in the header and button
genre-rank-groups-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message before deleting a rank group
genre-rank-groups-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation message before deleting a rank group
genre-rank-groups-confirm-duplicate-mess: Confirmation message before duplicating a rank group
genre-rank-groups-confirm-duplicate-titl: Title for the confirmation message before duplicating a rank group
genre-rank-groups-error-add: Text for the call to action link when no rank groups were found in the database
genre-rank-groups-error-not-found: Error message when no rank groups were found in the database
genre-rank-groups-explain: Text that explains what rank groups are
genre-rank-groups-find: Label for the text field that filters rank groups down to what the user types
genre-rank-groups-flash-added-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank group has been created
genre-rank-groups-flash-added-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a rank group has been created
genre-rank-groups-flash-deleted-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank group has been deleted
genre-rank-groups-flash-deleted-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a rank group has been deleted
genre-rank-groups-flash-duplicated-messa: Flash message notifying a user that a rank group has been duplicated
genre-rank-groups-flash-duplicated-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a rank group has been duplicated
genre-rank-groups-flash-updated-message: Flash message notifying a user that all the rank groups have been updated
genre-rank-groups-flash-updated-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that all rank groups have been updated
genre-rank-groups-flash-validation-messa: Flash message notifying the user that there were validation issues with updating rank groups
genre-rank-groups-flash-validation-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that there were validation issues with updating rank groups
genre-rank-groups-new-base-image: Label for the dropdown menu that lets users pick a new rank base image
genre-rank-groups-select: Placeholder that prompts the user to select a rank group
genre-rank-groups-unsaved: Message that notifies a user they have unsaved changes to their rank groups
genre-rank-info-add: Label for adding a new rank info; appears in the header and button
genre-rank-info-confirm-delete-message: Confirmation message before deleting a rank info
genre-rank-info-confirm-delete-title: Title for the confirmation message before deleting a rank info
genre-rank-info-error-add: Text for the call to action link when no rank info was found in the database
genre-rank-info-error-not-found: Error message when no rank info was found in the database
genre-rank-info-explain: Text that explains what rank info is
genre-rank-info-find: Label for the text field that filters rank info down to what the user types
genre-rank-info-flash-added-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank info has been created
genre-rank-info-flash-added-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a rank info has been created
genre-rank-info-flash-deleted-message: Flash message notifying a user that a rank info has been deleted
genre-rank-info-flash-deleted-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that a rank info has been deleted
genre-rank-info-flash-updated-message: Flash message notifying a user that all the rank info have been updated
genre-rank-info-flash-updated-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that all rank info have been updated
genre-rank-info-flash-validation-message: Flash message notifying the user that there were validation issues with updating rank info
genre-rank-info-flash-validation-title: Title for the flash message notifying a user that there were validation issues with updating rank info
genre-rank-info-select: Placeholder prompting th user to select a rank info
genre-rank-info-short_name: Label for a text field that collects the rank short name
genre-rank-info-unsaved: Message that notifies a user they have unsaved changes to their rank info
genre-rank-info-validation-required-shor: Validation message when there is a missing rank short name
validation-email-required: Validation message when there's a missing email address
validation-email-valid: Validation message when there's an invalid email address
validation-key-required: Validation message when there's a missing unique key
validation-name-required: Validation message when a name is missing
validation-password-confirm: Validation message when a password field and the confirmation password don't match
validation-password-min: Validation message when the password doesn't meet the minimum number of characters
validation-password-required: Validation message when there's a missing password
